sys_hub_flow.description:
This sub-flow contains steps to upload an attachment to Box and add related metadata to the uploaded file.

Sub-flow Steps:

  1. Upload File: This action uploads a file from ServiceNow to Box.
  2. Add Metadata to File: The steps adds metadata to the upload file which contains information about the related service now record.
  3. Create Shared Link: The steps Creates a Shared Link which can be used to access or download the file using a URL.

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
